DocAttribute.Name: KnotMultiplicities
DocAttribute.Documentation: The multiplicities of the knots. This list defines the number of times each knot in the knots list is to be repeated in constructing the knot array.

DocAttribute.Name: Knots
DocAttribute.Documentation: The list of distinct knots used to define the B-spline basis functions.

DocAttribute.Name: KnotSpec
DocAttribute.Documentation: The description of the knot type. This is for information only.

DocAttribute.Name: UpperIndexOnKnots
DocAttribute.Documentation: The upper index on the knot arrays; the lower index is 1.

DocWhereRule.Name: ConsistentBSpline
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The function IfcConstraintsParamBSpline returns TRUE if no inconsistencies in the parametrisation of the B-spline are found.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrespondingKnotLists
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The number of elements in the knot multiplicities list shall be equal to the number of elements in the knots list.
